H0.text: what is the spelling of lakh in english. Laksh

H1.text: what is the spelling of lakh in english. Lac

H2.text: what is the spelling of lakh in english. Lakhm

H3.text: what is the spelling of lakh in english. lakh

A4.text: A lakh (; abbreviated L; sometimes written lac) is a unit in the Indian numbering system equal to one hundred thousand.

A5.text: The modern word lakh derives from Sanskrit: लक्ष, romanized: lakṣa.
